---
title: "Frequentist Linear Mixed Modell for the UCAP data set"
format: html
editor: visual
---

## Load packages and dataset

```{r}
library("Rmisc")
library("dplyr")
library("ggplot2")
library("lme4")
library("readr")
```

```{r}
trials <- read_csv("output/trials.csv")
head(trials)
```

## Fitting LMM

### with lme4

```{r}
mod <- lme4::lmer(N2 ~ 1 + n_b + (1|participant_id), trials)
summary(mod)
```

### p-values using lmerTest

```{r}
mod2 <- lmerTest::lmer(N2 ~ 1 + n_b + (1 + n_b | participant_id), trials)
summary(mod)
```
